Paragraph: A flurothyl ether seizure screening technique was used to evaluate seizure susceptibility in adult mice that received neonatal injections of MSG ( 4 mg / g and 1 mg / g ) .

| --- |

| Seizure susceptibility |
| Neonatal injections of MSG (4 mg/g and 1 mg/g) |

Note: "Neonatal injections of MSG" is not a disease, but rather a treatment or intervention. Therefore, it is not included in the list of diseases.
